fields.role: Uses tactical and ultimate explosives to flush enemies from cover and dominate mid‑range engagements.
fields.lead_when: When you have a clear line of sight to set up a grenade barrage.
fields.follow_when: When teammates need a safe entry after your explosives clear the area.
fields.disengage_when: When your grenades are on cooldown and enemies close in.

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Commit with grenade setups; hold if no clear target.

passive.leverage_when: Using grenade damage to chip opponents before engagements.

ultimate.do_not_use_when: Enemies are already low health and will be finished by teammates.
ultimate.abort_conditions: Ring forces you into close quarters before you can fire.

fight_flow.start: Throw grenade cluster to force enemies out of cover.
fight_flow.mid_fight: Follow up with tactical grenade and maintain pressure.
fight_flow.exit_reset: Ult to block pursuers and reset the fight.

rotations.early_game: Secure a position with clear grenade lines.
rotations.mid_game: Rotate to new sightlines, keep grenades ready.
rotations.late_game: Use ultimate to deny final‑ring pushes.
rotations.bad_rotation: Rotating without grenade coverage leaves you vulnerable.

ideal_primary.reason: Consistent mid‑range damage while setting up explosives.

ideal_secondary.reason: Close‑range finishers after grenades clear cover.

common_mistakes: Throwing grenades too early without vision
Using ultimate when enemies are already low
Rotating without a grenade line of sight
fields.mental_rule: If you lack a clear grenade line → fall back and reposition.
